00019 void eol_camera_config()
00020 {
00021   eolConfig *conf;
00022   eolLine temp;
00023   memset(&_eol_camera,0,sizeof(eolCamera));
00024   _eol_camera.cameratype = eolCamera2D;
00025   _eol_camera.followHeight = 10;
00026   _eol_camera.moveStep = 1;
00027   conf = eol_config_load("system/camera.cfg");
00028   if (conf == NULL)return;
00029   eol_config_get_line_by_tag(temp,conf,"cameraType");
00030   _eol_camera.cameratype = eol_camera_get_type_by_string(temp);
00031   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&_eol_camera.followHeight,conf,"followHeight");
00032   eol_config_get_float_by_tag(&_eol_camera.moveStep,conf,"moveStep");
00033   eol_config_free(&conf);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void eol_camera_init()
00037 {
00038   eolGraphicsView view;
00039   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_camera:initializing\n");
00040   eol_graphics_get_view(&view);
00041   _eol_camera.bounds.x = view.xRes;
00042   _eol_camera.bounds.y = view.yRes;
00043   switch(_eol_camera.cameratype)
00044   {
00045     case eolCameraEditor:
00046       _eol_camera.update = eol_camera_editor_update;
00047       _eol_camera.position.z = _eol_camera.followHeight;
00048       break;
00049     case eolCamera2D:
00050       _eol_camera.update = eol_camera_2d_update;
00051       _eol_camera.position.z = _eol_camera.followHeight;
00052       break;
00053     case eolCameraThird:
00054       _eol_camera.update = eol_camera_third_update;
00055       break;
00056     case eolCameraFirst:
00057       _eol_camera.update = eol_camera_first_update;
00058       break;
00059   }
00060   eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_camera:initialized\n");
00061 }
00062 
00063 void eol_camera_editor_update(eolCamera *cam, void *data)
00064 {
00065   eolInt x,y;
00066   /*check input*/
00067   if (!cam)return;
00068   if (eol_mouse_input_held(eolMouseCenter))
00069   {
00070     eol_mouse_get_motion(&x, &y);
00071     cam->position.x += (-x * _eol_camera.moveStep);
00072     cam->position.y += (y * _eol_camera.moveStep);
00073   }
00074   if (eol_mouse_input_held(eolMouseLeft) && eol_mouse_input_held(eolMouseRight))
00075   {
00076     eol_mouse_get_motion(&x, &y);
00077     cam->position.z += (-y * _eol_camera.moveStep);
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void eol_camera_2d_update(eolCamera *cam, void *data)
00082 {
00083   eolOrientation ori;
00084   if ((_eol_camera.getOri == NULL) ||
00085       (_eol_camera.target == NULL))return;
00086   ori = _eol_camera.getOri(_eol_camera.target);
00087 }

00096 
00097 void eol_camera_update()
00098 {
00099   if (_eol_camera.update == NULL)return;
00100   _eol_camera.update(&_eol_camera,NULL);
00101 }

00103 void eol_camera_setup()
00104 {
00105   /*TODO: verify rotation*/
00106   glRotatef(-_eol_camera.rotation.x, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00107   glRotatef(-_eol_camera.rotation.y, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00108   glRotatef(-_eol_camera.rotation.z, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00109   glTranslatef(-_eol_camera.position.x,
00110                -_eol_camera.position.y,
00111                -_eol_camera.position.z);
00112 }

00114 void eol_camera_set_height(eolFloat dist)
00115 {
00116   _eol_camera.position.z = _eol_camera.followHeight = dist;
00117 }

00119 eolUint eol_camera_get_type_by_string(char *camtype)
00120 {
00121   if (!camtype)return 0;
00122   if (strcmp(camtype,"EDITOR") == 0)
00123     return eolCameraEditor;
00124   if (strcmp(camtype,"2D") == 0)
00125     return eolCamera2D;
00126   if (strcmp(camtype,"THIRD") == 0)
00127     return eolCameraThird;
00128   if (strcmp(camtype,"FIRST") == 0)
00129     return eolCameraFirst;
00130   if (strcmp(camtype,"CUSTOM") == 0)
00131     return eolCameraCustom;
00132   return 0;
00133 }
